tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE child_contact_info (
  child_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  child_name VARCHAR(50),
  child_dob DATE,
  child_phone VARCHAR(15),
  child_email VARCHAR(50),
  parent_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (parent_id) REFERENCES parent_contact_info(parent_id)
);

CREATE TABLE child_contacts (
    child_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    child_name VARCHAR(50),
    parent_id INT,
    relationship VARCHAR(50),
    FOREIGN KEY (parent_id) REFERENCES parent_contacts(parent_id)
);

CREATE TABLE communication_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    log_date DATE,
    log_time TIME,
    log_description TEXT,
    parent_id INT,
    child_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (parent_id) REFERENCES parent_contacts(parent_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (child_id) REFERENCES child_contacts(child_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Child (
    child_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    child_name VARCHAR(50),
    child_birthdate DATE,
    parent_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (parent_id) REFERENCES Parent(parent_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Custody_Schedule (
    schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    child_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (child_id) REFERENCES Child(child_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Communication_Log (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    log_date TIMESTAMP,
    log_description TEXT,
    parent_id INT,
    child_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (parent_id) REFERENCES Parent(parent_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (child_id) REFERENCES Child(child_id)
);

CREATE TABLE children (
    child_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    child_name VARCHAR(50),
    child_age INT,
    parent_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (parent_id) REFERENCES parents(parent_id)
);

CREATE TABLE communications (
    communication_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    communication_date TIMESTAMP,
    communication_type VARCHAR(50),
    case_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (case_id) REFERENCES custody_cases(case_id)
);

CREATE TABLE documents (
    doc_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    doc_name VARCHAR(50),
    doc_type VARCHAR(50),
    case_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (case_id) REFERENCES custody_cases(case_id)
);
